document.full_text: the department of justice said on monday it was investigating the newark police department, the state's largest, after receiving civil rights complaints and claims of excessive force tied to seven deaths.
document.title: justice dept. investigates complaints against newark police
lines_and_colors: the department of justice said on monday it was investigating the newark police department, the state's largest, after receiving civil rights complaints and claims of excessive force tied to seven deaths.
